IB Link CapacityMichelle Per our conversation BRTI and Transwestern agree to increase the MDQ of transportation contract from MMBtu per day to MMBtu per day effective The agreed to rate for the incremental transportation quantity of MMBtuday is per MMBtu plus fuel As agreed BRTI will have alternate receipt points from Ignacio and La Plata as well as EPNG Blanco as an alternate delivery point Thank you Julie

OBA and Cashout Agreement Name Change Cc Dennis Effective April please change Burlington Resources Trading Inc to Burlington Resources Gathering Inc on our OBA and cashout agreements Please let me know if you require any additional information Thank you Julie Reames
